question: India signed a MoU with which of the following country to enhance connectivity and promote developmental projects in Northeast India?
explanation: India and Japan have signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) to set up India Japan Act East Forum to enhance connectivity and promote developmental projects in Northeast India. It was one of the 15 major agreements signed between both countries during Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe's visit to India for the 12th Indo-Japan annual summit.
